subject: Pro x pedals
description_text:
I upgraded to the pro x ultra control box so I can use the vam pro haptics
but my pedals won't register with the pro x ultra control box what do I do?
The box on the left came with my pro x updated pedals and the right box is
the pro x ultra.

conversations.body_text: Hi Dalton Uhl,  In the “Settings - Update” section, click “Manual Firmware Update,” then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder → and select the proxultra.sfu file to update. This firmware will disable the 4th axis.          You also need to perform an Offset adjustment — please click the Offset button in the top right corner of the software.      Our software currently supports 10 games. May I ask which game you are using now? We are continuously working to add telemetry support for more titles. In the meantime, you can use the internal version of SimHub that I’ve provided. The official release is still undergoing testing and may take a bit more time.   https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QrSbAvCC5iyx9XgdRgSQV-hWpmDGkujc/view?usp=sharing

I'm using simsonn manager  2.08. And I tried assetto corsa and beam.ng and
they were registering inside the game. I will try again when I get home.
Thank you for the assistance
